TopicTitle: [1.3.X -> 1.6.X] Other_Worlds Star Pack Reboot | Redoing the whole system again!

Articles.Content:
Getting close to finishing it. So excited! I'm currently doing the probably most complex part, but it's not as big as the rest.

For those who have been reading the forum and/or the discord chats where I talk, I come with a little present. Nothing very big, but hopefuly charming enough. (Use Z/X/Arrows to navigate)

Two news

Made a Discord Server where I will announce stuff like beta-testing and the release of the mod!

And also, if you join that server, you will find a application to beta-test!

 

The mod is very, very near completion, so I guess it's the time to be excited.

On 1/18/2023 at 9:44 PM, Pkmniako said:

The mod is very, very near completion, so I guess it's the time to be excited.

Question: I have a career save with this and OPM and im at a point where i can start sending probes with FFT. Should i wait until the release of the new version before sending stuff there?

Also OPM is incompatible with the newest version of Scatterer. Will this be a problem where the newer Cercani will be incompatible with old Scatterer so also incompatible with OPM by proxy?

On 1/22/2023 at 5:01 PM, EnderiumSmith said:

Question: I have a career save with this and OPM and im at a point where i can start sending probes with FFT. Should i wait until the release of the new version before sending stuff there?

Also OPM is incompatible with the newest version of Scatterer. Will this be a problem where the newer Cercani will be incompatible with old Scatterer so also incompatible with OPM by proxy?

Yes, it is compatible with OPM. And regarding scatterer, it uses configuration files for the latests versions of the mod.

You also might want to wait a bit for the new version. Though the differences in stuff like orbits and masses are barely there, there's some that could still affect the savefile.

Haven't said it here, but release is going to be tomorrow unless I find a big bug that has to be fixed. I will make a new forum post for it, finally in the addon releases section. Don't ask about the specific hour, I have no idea either.

Thank you for those who have been curious about the mod's development through this months.

A new forum post has been made for the mod, now including a story mode
